snippet: People across the political spectrum are peddling the notion that America is in big trouble. And their diagnoses vary. It's the schools! The high taxes! The low taxes! The unions! The corporations! The greed of the rich! The sloth of the poor! What...
abstract: People across the political spectrum are peddling the notion that America is in big trouble. And their diagnoses vary. It's the schools! The high taxes! The low taxes! The unions! The corporations! The greed of the rich! The sloth of the poor! What do you think most ails the United States today?
